param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css classes of the module, this allows individual module styling.

param.name: direction
param.label: Item Style
param.description: Style of the items in the module. If 'DIV Container' is selected, the items are within separate DIV containers. Use this to show the module horizontally. Style the container view by adding the CSS class 'sobi2latest' to your template CSS file. If 'List' is selected the items are in list view.

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: Number of items to display (default 5, min. 1).

param.name: item_length
param.label: Title Length
param.description: Max. length of the title. If the title is longer, it will be shortened and three dots are added.

param.name: categorydepend
param.label: Category Dependant
param.description: If in category view, show only the items of that category.
